body.p:
185
May 3d 4
Jos. Doniphan Esq
Augusta Ky.
Sir

Your communication of the 28th ult addressed to his Excellency Governor Bramlette, has been referred to me for reply. I have the honor to state that the rule of this Department is, in all cases before a commission can be issued, it is necessary to have the recommendation of the commanding officer of the regiment in which they desire promotion -- If the two gentlemen of whom you write will obtain such a recommendation as above mentioned they will be commissioned immediately --

Very Respectfully
John Boyle
Adjt Genl of Ky.
